name: Chungus Rampage in Big forest
description:
Farmer has built a new farm near forest. He hunts and cooks chickens, deers and rabbits. He captures cows and goats and take milk. He cuts trees to sale wood.

All animals are scared from farmer. They want villager to leave the forest. But no one dares to fight farmer. Everyone is scared of his gunshot.

One day, Chungus finds a magic glove with super powers! He decides to fight the farmer. Chungus will burn his corps, destroy his animals and will get back his friends!
